title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: The match in which the yeoman Locksley over-comes all the antagonists whom Prince John bringsup against him, finds a parallel, and indeed we maysay foundation, in the ballad of "Adam Bell, Clymo' the Cleuch, and William of Cloudeslea."
